page.title: 03The village blacksmith.(3)
page.content: The blacksmith is a Fellow of the Worshipful Company of{Farriers}and is qualified in every branch of the trade-shoeing;surgical shoeing;examining;judging;lecturing. The Diploma of the W.C.of F. is awarded upon completion of a written, practical and oral examination. The{hours of business}approx. are 7.30 am - 4.30 pm and he allows himself about two weeks holiday a year. To{shoe a horse,}from start to finish(including making the shoes), takes about two hours. However, most of his customers are regulars and he can make the shoes prior to fitting in which case the process takes about 3/4 hour. The shoes are made of mild steel and he usually buys the bars already grooved.
